ygData.subject: RE: From eq.stratics.com
ygData.msgSnippet: anyone know what lev meldrath is? ... From: jbuckingham@tacit.co.nz [mailto:jbuckingham@tacit.co.nz] Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 5:35 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
anyone know what lev meldrath is?

-----Original Message-----
From: jbuckingham@... [mailto:jbuckingham@...]
Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 5:35 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] From eq.stratics.com


From: jbuckingham@...




<Disclaimer: This is not my information, I just copied and pasted a post
from
the above site's message boards>

The message subject was "Just made a collapsible fishing pole" or some
such..

"


Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the
recipes.



"

Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for the
new
ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become
apparent,
as all those rangers go gunning for him :)
